      • iterateThroughPages

        public void iterateThroughPages(java.lang.String xPathOfResults,
                                java.lang.String xPathOfNextPage,
                                java.util.List<PlayerDetails> playerDetails,
                                int locationOfNextPageElement,
                                int numberOfNavigationElements,
                                java.lang.String specifiedName)
        Iterates through a number of AJAX-enabled tabs recursively till no more tabs are left. Extracts info from each tab and adds it to a list.
        Parameters:
        xPathOfResults - - The x-path of the element containing the text required.
        xPathOfNextPage - - The x-path of the element used to navigate to next page.
        names - - A list of results.
        locationOfNextPageElement - - The location of the "next page"- button/link. .
        numberOfNavigationElements - - The number of total navigation elements to the left of the next page element, including the next page-element itself.
